# Overview {.unnumbered}

Personal notes covering cloud computing in general, with a focus on Azure,

## Azure Fundamentals (AZ900)

We start with a certification from Microsoft where the learning material is
  free but the examination has a cost.
  
More information at [Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals][az900].
